data.title: Mary J. Blige to sing national anthem at Derby | ABC7 San Francisco | abc7news.com
meta_keywords: Mary J. Blige to sing national anthem at Derby
data.meta_description: Grammy winner Mary J. Blige is expected to sing the national anthem at this year's Kentucky Derby.
data.text:
LOUISVILLE, Ky. (AP) - April 23, 2012

A statement from Churchill Downs on Monday says Blige will sing "The Star-Spangled Banner" at the Louisville track around 5:10 p.m. on May 5, shortly before the running of the 138th Kentucky Derby.

Blige has won nine Grammy Awards and four American Music Awards since her debut album "What's the 411" in 1992 that had two No. 1 hits: "You Remind Me" and "Real Love."
